title: How to Run a Java Application in Eclipse

steps.title: Download and Install Java, and Eclipse if the programs are not yet installed.
steps.content: Download and Install Java , and Eclipse if the programs are not yet installed.

steps.title: Create a new class with following File > New > Class..
steps.content: Create a new class with following File > New > Class..

steps.title: Enter name of the class and press finish.
steps.content: Enter name of the class and press finish. .

steps.title: Enter code statement System.out.println("Hello World"); and Save (Shortcut :
steps.content: Enter code statement System.out.println("Hello World"); and Save (Shortcut : CTRL+S).

steps.title: Run Program as shown in the image..
steps.content: Run Program as shown in the image..
